attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Capita are a hidden, privatised state. They collect taxes, operate baliff companies, give legal advice and advise on policy. They are, de facto, a privatised state within a state. They are, however, UNELECTED and UNACCOUNTABLE. We call for parliament and the PM to bring Capita and other privatised companies involved in public administration to become FULLY and TRANSPARENTLY accountable to those they are meant to serve.

rejection.details: Please resubmit after deleting the excessive use of block capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
